segments.advisor_message: So, uh, tell me a bit about your job. What do you do, if you don’t mind sharing?
segments.client_message: Oh, yeah, for sure! I work at uh, a software company, you know, like, um, uh, creating applications and stuff. Just, just got promoted actually! Oh, and my title, um, it’s, uh, Senior Developer. But you know, everyone just calls me, uh, Sam, like, my last name is Virgo but yeah, just Sam.  Um, I'm also, like, pretty busy with some team projects, so, yeah, it can get a bit hectic!
